meanings.definition: Robles: a surname of Spanish origin.
meanings.sent1: The Robles family had a big reunion last weekend.
meanings.sent2: Many people share the surname Robles in our town.
meanings.sent3: Mr. Robles joked that he must be related to everyone with the same last name.
meanings.sent4: The Robles name stands out like a bright light in our family history.
meanings.sent5: The Robles surname is as unique as a rare gem.

meanings.definition: Robles: a type of oak tree found in California.
meanings.sent1: The robles in the park provide shade on hot days.
meanings.sent2: Hikers enjoy the beauty of the robles along the trail.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels play hide-and-seek among the robles' branches.
meanings.sent4: The robles sway gently in the breeze like dancers in a ballet.
meanings.sent5: The robles' leaves rustle like whispers in the wind.

meanings.definition: Robles: a city in the Philippines.
meanings.sent1: My friend visited Robles during her trip to the Philippines.
meanings.sent2: The bustling streets of Robles are filled with vendors selling local goods.
meanings.sent3: In Robles, the locals are as warm as the tropical sun.
meanings.sent4: The city of Robles is a beacon of hope for many seeking a better life.
meanings.sent5: The lights of Robles twinkle like stars in the night sky.
